galaxy.summary: Single locus resolution of Transposable ELEment expression.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Telescope is a tool for the characterization of the retrotranscriptome by accurate estimation of transposable element expression and the quantification of transposable element expression using RNA-seq.It can be used for Statistical Performance of TE Quantification Methods.All scripts needed to examine the sensitivity and biases of computational approaches for quantifying TE expression: 1) unique counts, 2) best counts, 3) RepEnrich, 4) TEtranscripts, 5) RSEM, 6) SalmonTE, and 7) Telescope.
